description: Customize password validation rules for your users.

genericError.description: Failed to update password validation configuration.

messages.defaultRuleApplyMessage: days password expiry if no other rules match to the user.
messages.defaultRuleSkipMessage: password expiry if no other rules match to the user.
messages.info: Rules will be applied in the order listed below, from top to bottom. Use the arrows to adjust the priority.

validationError.consecutiveChrMismatch: Number of consecutive characters should be less than tha minimum length of the password.
validationError.invalidConfig: Unable to create password with the above configurations.
validationError.maxLimitError: The maximum length cannot be more than {{maxPasswordValue}}.
validationError.minLimitError: The minimum length cannot be less than 8.
validationError.minMaxMismatch: Minimum length should be less than maximum length.
validationError.uniqueChrMismatch: Number of unique characters should be less than tha minimum length of the password.
